page.title: 18SCAWSBY/CUSWORTH CLINIC
page.content: Built in 1959 wooden building to provide facilities to promote health in community from birth to death.12 professional people work in&from this clinic-2 Doctors,2 Receptionists,1 Health Visitor,1 Assistant Health Visitor,1 District Nurse, 4 Nurses of various grades,6 1 District Midwife.Provide huge range of care,advice medical help for unborn child to elderly.This involves Primary Health Care Meetings: discuss & provide best care for individual Family Planning clinic-Baby Clinic to check wt. child's development & carry out routine injection for 1st 4yrs-Hearing,Eye Clinics-Ante Natal Clinics-Home visits to advise parents,observe young babies,attend sick,disabled,elderly.Clinic sells baby foods,& types of medical equipment required by elderly.
